properties.name: persistent-timer.poll-rate
properties.description: The rate in which the scheduler should check for new tasks.

properties.name: persistent-timer.max-threads
properties.description: The amount of threads to use, use 0 to disable the task processing.

properties.name: persistent-timer.task-timeout
properties.description: The amount of time a task and scheduler has time to finish a task in seconds, default 5min.

properties.name: persistent-timer.poll-task-timeout
properties.description: How often the system should check for abandond tasks in seconds, default every 5min.

properties.name: persistent-timer.clean-trigger-rate
properties.description: How often old triggers should be deleted in seconds, default every 2hours.
